column4: Is there an application to download and transfer podcasts to an iPod?  I can't seem to find anything.
i don't think so, but i'm not sure, google it

I have, and came up with nothing.  Lots of stuff about podcasting, which is easy as pie.  I can't just write a bash script because there are playlist databases on the ipod that need to be edited.  gtkpod uses them.. but doesn't deal with podcasts.  I'd like to think this would be a common question..
